alkemiNetwork().details: Returns the address of the Alkemi Network contract address.

constructor.details: Initializes the liquidity reserve state setting the Alkemi Network and the provider address.

havePermission().details: Returns true if the caller is the current liquidity provider

isAlkemiNetwork().details: Returns true if the caller is Alkemi Network contract.

isLiquidityprovider().details: Returns true if the caller is the current liquidity provider.

liquidityProvider().details: Returns the address of the current liquidity provider.

transferLiquidityProvider(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newLiquidityprovider`). Can only be called by the current liquidity provider.
